alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 12:49PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Elko and central Eureka Counties through 130 PM PDT... At 1248 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles south of Pine Valley, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Elko and central Eureka Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County
